uMordhau Documentations

Unofficial Mordhau Documentations

Built by Mordhau Community

Get Start Contributing
Look to Vitepress

🙌 Easy to read.

The documentation is designed in a simplified manner, making it easy to read.

🗣️ Multilingual

Providing multiple languages to enable non-English-speaking contributors to read the documentation.

🔥 Modern Design

The documentation is built with the latest designs, ensuring both a visually appealing layout and smooth browsing performance.

🌟 No Annoying ADs

We made sure to clean up the website and enhance its readability by removing ads. This is a unique feature that most of the scattered Mordhau documentation does not offer.
